name: Alice 〜 Yuri Visual Novel 〜
description:
Alice yearns for a life past forced betrothals that leave her a trophy to be shown. Her life takes a turn for the unexpected after she follows a strange pale girl with rabbit ears into a hole. She awakens in a new world with cute girls, anthropomorphic animals, and... hot woman?!

~16k words
3 routes 
3 Cgs
~500 voiced lines
Original soundtrack
A literal catgirl, c'mon, just play the game

Writing by: Sasha Ines (General writing), Bryan Morris(Bunny’s route), Sarah (Kat’s route), Oishii (Maddy’s route)

Art and coding by: Sasha Ines

Proofread by: Ra~Chan

Casting by: Eliana Zebro
VO designers: Gwyn Williams, Georgia Triantafyllopoulou, Thomas Chastagnol

Thank you to Pumpkin Spike, Georgia Triantafyllopoulou and Gwyn Williams for playtesting the game!

Extra credits: menu code by Skolaztika

And special thanks to you for playing!

TLDR: Follow cute bunny girl down a hole and become even gayer.

Are you stuck?
